name: Black Diary [Remake] Chapter One
description:
Black Diary Remake is currently in development.

This Pre-Alpha release contains the first 10 minutes of the story, which can change depending on the order that you decide to explore in, and what you decide to take. It is recommended to try out different combinations to see what has changed.

Recommended age: 17+

Contains strong language, depictions of blood/gore

_____________________________________________________________________________

The young woman wakes up after having fallen. Or being dropped. Surveying her surroundings, she concludes that she is no longer on her college campus, or anywhere near it. Was it all just a prank or could something more sinister be at play here?

*follow https://twitter.com/BlackDiaryGame for updates

---------------------------------------

(*Black Diary uses 3D assets from the SketchUp Warehouse. Here's a collection I put together of what may be in the game. https://3dwarehouse.sketchup.com/collection/b8bafc28-59c0-46d7-bbfb-1003e9b6520a/Black-Diary)
